version_description:
• Added the ability to set or edit the miner name
• Small improvements

• Added the ability to set or edit the miner name
• Small improvements

• Added the ability to set or edit the miner name
• Small improvements

• Added the ability to set or edit the miner name
• Small improvements

We are pleased to present you the new My Ethermine application, refreshed and improved. So, besides the new UI/UX, here's what is new:
• a new home screen
• added the ability to change the auto refresh interval
• added last update on the home screen (that happened on the Ethermine.org server)
• added RVN and Beam
• added more currencies
• improved charts. tap and drag to see detailed statistics
• added wallet summary screen for ETH, ETC, ZEC, RVN
• allow landscape orientation on iPad
... more to come

We are pleased to present you the new My Ethermine application, refreshed and improved. So, besides the new UI/UX, here's what is new:
• a new home screen
• added the ability to change the auto refresh interval
• added last update on the home screen (that happened on the Ethermine.org server)
• added RVN and Beam
• added more currencies
• improved charts. tap and drag to see detailed statistics
• added wallet summary screen for ETH, ETC, ZEC, RVN
• allow landscape orientation on iPad
... more to come

Some bugs that we've fixed:

• Graph colors for current and average hash rate swapped
• Inactive miners were displayed incorrectly or not at all. Now, if a miner is inactive for more than 20 minutes, it will be displayed in red
• Solved some typos and text formatting
• Resolved overlapping values in graphs when there is not much data
• Timestamps was displayed in UTC instead of local time
• Setting the preferred currency does not work immediately


Improvements:

• Decimals were adjusted where needed (Payout threshold, Daily estimate, Last payout, Payout graph values, Prices ...)
• The price chart displays decimals and the price in your preferred currency
• When the preferred currency is other than USD, the equivalent in USD will be displayed below
• Some improvements under the hood

Some bugs that we've fixed:

• Graph colors for current and average hash rate swapped
• Inactive miners were displayed incorrectly or not at all. Now, if a miner is inactive for more than 20 minutes, it will be displayed in red
• Solved some typos and text formatting
• Resolved overlapping values in graphs when there is not much data
• Timestamps was displayed in UTC instead of local time
• Setting the preferred currency does not work immediately


Improvements:

• Decimals were adjusted where needed (Payout threshold, Daily estimate, Last payout, Payout graph values, Prices ...)
• The price chart displays decimals and the price in your preferred currency
• When the preferred currency is other than USD, the equivalent in USD will be displayed below
• Some improvements under the hood

• Added Next payout date/time and Last payouts in Payouts screen
• Added Worker details with hashrates and shares graphs
• Added the ability to switch between Reported and Current hashrate for ETH & ETC miners (tap the column header in the Workers screen)
• Added Estimated earnings matrix
• Minor UI and under the hood improvements

• Added Next payout date/time and Last payouts in Payouts screen
• Added Worker details with hashrates and shares graphs
• Added the ability to switch between Reported and Current hashrate for ETH & ETC miners (tap the column header in the Workers screen)
• Added Estimated earnings matrix
• Minor UI and under the hood improvements
